entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -42.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 10:13 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -42.3°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -47.2°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 41.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 41. Wind chill minus 61 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
